${ModID}:TurbulencePower.NAME: Turbulence
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.
Whenever you #yChannel an Orb, trigger its passive ability #b%d times.

${ModID}:WormHolePower.NAME: Worm Hole
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase damage or #yBlock value of #yDoppels by #b%d for each #yStrength or #yDexterity you have.
